overview: Thieving ain’t easy. Jasmine learns that the hard way when Luke, her lover and partner in crime, betrays her to the cops to land her behind bars. With the help of three badass inmates, Jasmine busts out of prison and plots to steal a rare jewel worth millions. Watch the nonstop action unfold as these sexy criminals go head-to-head with Luke’s armed gang as they hunt down the priceless gem… and each other.
title: Blown Away
